tasks.label: Run all (Eureka -> Articulo -> Boleta)
tasks.command: powershell -NoExit -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','cd "${workspaceFolder}\EurekaServerN"; mvn spring-boot:run' ; Start-Sleep -s 5 ; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','cd "${workspaceFolder}\ApiArticuloN"; mvn spring-boot:run' ; Start-Sleep -s 2 ; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit','-Command','cd "${workspaceFolder}\ApiBoletaN"; mvn spring-boot:run'"
